title: Utilizing Learning Analytics for Designing and Operating Collaborative Learning Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic collaborative learning concepts and digital tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Capacity development for operating collaborative learning projects aimed at strengthening social sector job competencies for current practitioners

learning_goals: Using learning analytics tools, they can predict learner engagement patterns when designing collaborative learning activities.
Based on real-time learning analytics data, they can identify and respond to at least three issues arising during collaborative projects.
Reflecting on learning analytics results, they can improve existing collaborative learning designs in two or more aspects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
